alert.note: Alert for Paulding; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Allen, northeastern Adams, western Paulding and northwestern Van Wert Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 829 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monroeville, or 11 miles northeast of Decatur, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Payne around 840 PM EDT. Woodburn around 845 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Antwerp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
